options.name: Deck of Seasons
options.description: If enabled, the random season changes will be drawn from a deck containing each season only once. The deck will be reshuffled only after all seasons have appeared once. Otherwise, selection will be random.

options.name: Season Length
options.description: The number of turns that normally pass before a new Noble takes their turn (default: 80)

options.name: Master of the Hunt Enabled
options.description: A Fey Noble who empowers heroes and agents to do great and terrible deeds (default: true)

options.name: Painter of Winds Enabled
options.description: A Fey Noble who spreads darkness and chaos from place to place on the currents of wind (default: true)
